column4: guys, I'm trying to decide between Ubuntu Gusty and Debian Etch for a server...which would be recommended?
so, I guess my real question...can you use debootstrap on Gutsy to create a Debian Etch file system?
i was a debian fan but ubuntu is so much better. but had i not been a debian fan i would have never met ubuntu
agreed on desktop...I'm undecided on server side
